2.Colloseum

This colloseum of Rome of built by the emperors who used to rule Rome(obviously). It was used as an battle ground for various fighters who used to fight in the colloseum for sole sake of entertainment of the emperor and his audience. This colloseum had an interesting architecture, The ground on which the fighters used to fight had an underground system of elevators which were used to bring up various animals and fighters in the ongoing fight make the fight more interesting
